underlying_goal: To synthesize actionable feedback from a team member (Pablo) by searching through recent Slack DMs and add it to a tracking document.
primary_success: Claude successfully synthesized feedback from multiple, fragmented Slack messages and threads into a coherent summary of actionable points and updated the project's comment tracking file.
brief_summary: The user asked Claude to find and summarize recent feedback from a collaborator (Pablo) from Slack DMs. Claude searched the messages, found additional context in a public channel thread, synthesized the key discussion points (work division, experiment settings, AUC thresholds), and added them to the specs/comments-18-jan.md tracking file.
